scripts.generate: yarn generate_backup && yarn generate_cloud && yarn generate_openshift_cm && yarn generate_openshift_dr && yarn generate_openstack_cm && yarn generate_openstack_dr && yarn generate_sm && yarn generate_replicator && ./copy_types.sh
scripts.generate_backup: graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/backup_codegen.yml && graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/backup_codegen_types.yml && python codegen-configs/clean_up.py backup
scripts.generate_cloud: graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/cloud_codegen.yml && graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/cloud_codegen_types.yml && python codegen-configs/clean_up.py cloud
scripts.generate_openshift_cm: graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openShift_cm_codegen.yml && graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openShift_cm_codegen_types.yml && python codegen-configs/clean_up.py openShift_cm
scripts.generate_openshift_dr: graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openShift_dr_codegen.yml && graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openShift_dr_codegen_types.yml && python codegen-configs/clean_up.py openShift_dr
scripts.generate_openstack_cm: graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openStack_cm_codegen.yml && graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openStack_cm_codegen_types.yml && python codegen-configs/clean_up.py openStack_cm
scripts.generate_openstack_dr: graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openStack_dr_codegen.yml && graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/openStack_dr_codegen_types.yml && python codegen-configs/clean_up.py openStack_dr
scripts.generate_replicator: graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/replicator_codegen.yml && graphql-codegen --config codegen-configs/replicator_codegen_types.yml && python codegen-configs/clean_up.py replicator
